name: Pocket Politics 2
description:
Choose your Candidate, take the stage, and become President For Life!

Choose to play as a Liberal or Conservative in this satirical idle game of politics and power. Rise through the political ranks, gain cash from the biggest fundraisers in the country, and watch your lobbies earn billions to help you become the most powerful person in the free world. Can you lead your party to profits and power?

FEATURES
CHOOSE a Candidate that best represents your playstyle: Liberal or Conservative
COLLECT donations from supporters and watch your profits multiply
AUTOMATE your campaign with unique managers and supporters and earn idle cash while you’re away
UPGRADE your investors and watch your empire grow
COMPETE in special events to gain prestige and power

Become the greatest, richest, most famous, President ever!

Please Note: Pocket Politics 2 is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Playing Pocket Politics 2 requires a secure internet connection.
